lyrics.text:
Tu’u hoku ‘atamai,
Tu’u mo e fiefia;
‘O hanga ‘o si’ak
i
Ho ngaahi ilifia:
He ‘oku tu’u ‘a e Moihu
Ke fotufotuaki au.

‘Oku ne fakahā
‘A e nima ne touia;
‘Oku kei tulutā
‘A e vakavaka ia;
‘O fai pe hoku fak
a
laloa
He ngaahi matakafo na.

‘Afio he Tamai
‘A ‘ene fa’a hūfia.
‘Oku fu’u ngaue ai
‘A e finangalo ia.
‘O fakafisi fēfē ai!
Ko hono ‘Alo ‘oku fai.

Tala he Laumālie,
Ko e lotu kuo tal
i
;
Pea u ongo’i ē
‘I hoku ‘atamai,
Ku
o
fakamolemole au,
Kuo fānau’i au fo’ou.

Tu’u, laumālie, tu’u,
Ta’e ha ilifia.
Kuo ne ohi au,
Ko ‘eku Tamai ia.
Kau hanga hake, ‘o pehē,
“’E Tamai, ‘Apā Tamai ē!”
